functions.name: View Journeys of User
functions.description: Allows a user to view all the journeys they are part of, providing a comprehensive list of their involvement in various tasks and projects.

functions.name: Track Journey Progress
functions.description: Enables users to track their progress within a journey, offering insights into completed, ongoing, and pending tasks to ensure they stay on track.

functions.name: Complete Task
functions.description: Allows users to mark specific tasks within a journey as completed, updating their status and contributing to the overall progress of the journey.

functions.name: Show My Tasks
functions.description: Displays a list of tasks assigned to the user, helping them to manage their workload and prioritize their activities effectively.

functions.name: Show Team Journey Tasks and Report
functions.description: Provides an overview of the tasks and reports related to the team within a journey, facilitating team collaboration and monitoring team performance.

functions.name: Show Journey Activities
functions.description: Shows all the activities within a journey, offering a detailed view of what has been done and what is pending, ensuring transparency and accountability.
